Add.Title: Slide 3
Add.Content:
Downloading a website from Windows Azure


Azure Publisher allows you to download the website from Windows Azure and run it on a host of your choice. In this way you can set up a "staging" copy of a website from Windows Azure, for example, locally on WebMatrix or IIS.

Add.Title: Slide 1
Add.Content:
Advanced Publisher 

Apart from a simple version of Azure Publisher, you can also use the Advanced Publisher (right-click on "Windows Azure Publisher" | "Open Advanced Publisher"). It gives you more detailed status and progress information as well as allows you to download the website from Windows Azure.

Add.Title: Slide 2
Add.Content:
Blob change log

Besides, you can check the change log of the blob (right-click on "Windows Azure Publisher" | "Blob change log").

Add.Title: Neptune
Add.Content:
Welcome to Neptune

This is a C1 CMS starter site showing some of the features in CMS. You can skin it, customize it, extend it and re-design it...

Start CMS Console

Add.Title: Getting Started
Add.Content:
Getting Started

We have collected a few pointers to help you make this starter site your own. We have tried to keep it light, knowing that you probably just need to be pointed in the right direction, but if you get stuck or want to dig deep you will find links to more online resources.

Get started
